channel.title: How to host a client on a site?
channel.description:
Hey! I just found out my router (AirPort Express) can not forward ports, so i have no way to host the client and server i coded and edited. I was wondering how to put a client in a website. I think its called a Applet. Like http://www.moparisthebest.com has a client on their home page. And like how you play RS.
Thanks guys!

Mines sort of like that but i used Hamatchi and kept Run.bat open so it’s always on when i leave it up

item.title: How to host a client on a site?
item.dc:creator: @xPetrix xPetrix
item.description:
@xPetrix wrote:

The MSSP will say your server is offline no matter what you do if you use uTorrent. People can still connect to your server though.

Read full topic

item.title: How to host a client on a site?
item.dc:creator: @adecker adecker
item.description:
@adecker wrote:

I followed that uTorrent guid. It still says my server is offline. Is there some line of code i have to change to make it go throught my no-ip? or what?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 14, 2009, 07:40:43 pm[/size][hr]Please…Help? Lol. I put alot of work into this dont want it to go to waste.[br][br

Read full topic

VPS is good if you have a large amount of players connecting to your server.

item.title: How to host a client on a site?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

If your router wont allow ports to open, Utorrent is the only other option UNLESS you use a VPS.

Read full topic
item.source: How to host a client on a site?

item.title: How to host a client on a site?
item.dc:creator: @xPetrix xPetrix
item.description:
@xPetrix wrote:

Using uTorrent to host your server will work, but on the MSSP, it will say your server is offline because you have to portforward for it to say online.

Read full topic
item.source: How to host a client on a site?

item.title: How to host a client on a site?
item.dc:creator: @adecker adecker
item.description:
@adecker wrote:

Yea. I know. So that uTorrent thing you sent me wont work? Im so confused.

I want to host my server. I cant Port Forward. Is there anyway on how to.

Thanks for the FAST replies btw! =)

Read full topic
item.source: How to host a client on a site?

item.title: How to host a client on a site?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

You have to be port forwarded for a server to appear online, its so that connecting ips can gain access through your router via a port. On the serverstatus page, Thats just a list of servers that other people are hosting.

Read full topic
item.source: How to host a client on a site?

item.title: How to host a client on a site?
item.dc:creator: @adecker adecker
item.description:
@adecker wrote:

No i mean, on the server status page. Where all the others are hosted.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?action=register

Look familier? It says my server is offline. I have uTorrent up. I have the Server running. I have a no-ip account (x-temple.no-ip.org) i have no idea where to go from here…

Read full topic
